parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. For more information, see [How to ensure idempotence](~~327176~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the details of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region, including instance IDs.
